reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Google Photos integration needs to re-authenticate your account

init.description: Choose how and when the next photo is loaded. Warning: a high refresh rate for a lot of albums might lead into google api limits.
init.title: Adjust Google Photos options.

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) for [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) to give Home Assistant access to your Google Photos. You also need to create Application Credentials linked to your account:
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and click **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **Web application** for the Application Type.
